name: Lazer Maze | Never Mind Games Jam #2
name_original: Lazer Maze | Never Mind Games Jam #2
description:
Game Jam theme 

Two button controls

Controls 
  • Left mouse click places mirror
  • Right mouse click rotates mirror
  • Alt+F4 to close
Gameplay
  • Place a limited number of mirrors that reflect through a maze of mirror popping balloons

After winning the game jam, I went on to fully publish this game.
